content: यानं [या-भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Going, moving, walking, riding; as गजयानं, उष्ट्र°, रथ° &c. {@--2@} A voyage, journey; स मुद्रयानकुशलाः <ls>Ms. 8. 157</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 84.</ls> {@--3@} Marching against, attacking (one of the six Guṇas or expedients in politics); अहितान्प्रत्यभीतस्य रणे यानं <ls>Ak.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 160.</ls> {@--4@} A procession, train. {@--5@} A conveyance, vehicle, carriage, chariot; यानं सस्मार कौबेरं <ls>R. 15. 45</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 69</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 76</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 120.</ls> {@--6@} A litter, palanquin. --नः <ab>Ved.</ab> A road, way.
